Create a makeshift cooking surface using rocks or a large metal plate to place your food on.
Use a solar oven to cook your meal.
Create a geothermal oven by digging a hole and lining it with insulating materials, such as straw or wood chips, and placing a metal pot in the center.
Use a large cast iron pot or a Dutch oven to cook your meal over a fire.
Create a primitive outdoor cooking pit by digging a hole and lining it with stones and wood.
